reviews.review_msg: Great prof.  Very kind.  Open to interdisciplinary work and encourages us to follow our own interests within the discipline.

She's an all right teacher. Her instructions on criteria of the papers are very confusing. Also, she sends a lot of chunky articles but we hardly learn anything about them. She is a friendly person but her classes are long and extremely boring. She marks the midterms very hard, even though they are "open-book".

Bascom was one of the most excellent profs I've had so far! Class was so enjoyable to attend, even though he was a tough marker and gave you plenty to read. (5 ethnographies).  Lots of work, but no exams. Definitely worth it taking!
